document_title: Grade 3 fatty liver: Causes, signs and treatments
subsection_name: gan-nhiem-mo-do-3.json_5_Measures to prevent third-degree fatty liver
subsection_content:
To prevent grade 3 fatty liver and potential complications, we need to pay attention to the following factors:
Limit or do not drink alcohol; Weight management, do not be overweight/obese; Eat healthy (low in saturated fat, trans fat, and refined carbohydrates); Treat diabetes if you have the disease; Exercise at least 30 minutes every day

Grade 3 fatty liver is an alarming level that shows that the liver is at risk of getting worse. No longer in a mild or moderate condition, people with level 3 fatty liver disease should not subjectively take it lightly but need to quickly treat it early to increase liver recovery.
